name: pbmtoatk
description:
pbmtoatk -
convert portable bitmap to Andrew Toolkit raster object
body:
pbmtoatk

NAME

pbmtoatk - convert portable bitmap to Andrew Toolkit raster object

SYNOPSIS

pbmtoatk [pbmfile]

DESCRIPTION

Reads a portable bitmap as input. Produces a Andrew Toolkit raster object as output.

SEE ALSO

atktopbm(1), pbm(5)
